other_tests.findings: Normal standing balance for his age; right leg length (32.25 inches) and left leg length (33.25 inches), corrected by a heel lift. On the Performance-Oriented Mobility Assessment (Tinetti Scale), scored 24 out of 25 for balance and 7/12 for gait, indicating moderate fall risk.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Incremental steps of decline noted in gait, never fully recovered after falls.

other_tests.findings: All values including uric acid, thyrotropin, and lipid panel were within normal range.
No visual risk factors for falling identified.
